artistInfo.biography: 1- Antigona - rock opera is an outstanding musical project featuring famous classical artists and rockers. Homepage: http://www.antigona-rockopera.com/ 2- Antigona is a Spanish Heavy Metal Band founded on 2005. Formed in Toledo, Spain by Jose (Voices), Tacones [Orum, Dismaldramaâ€¦] (Drums), Giusepe (Bass) and Goico (Guitars). In 2006 Luismi (Guitars) joins the group and finalizes the line-up. Now is recording his new demo and working on the group's web page. Read more on Last.fm
